articles.title: Congolese President Hopes for Boosting Friendly Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Congolese President Hopes for Boosting Friendly Relations with DPRK
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Congolese President Denis Sassou Nguesso met DPRK Ambassador to Congo Ri Myong Chol on January 6.
					 He knows well about the DPRK, the president said, expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop.

articles.title: Workers, Farmers Vow to Implement Tasks Set Forth in Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
Workers, Farmers Vow to Implement Tasks Set Forth in Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Employees of industrial establishments and agricultural workers across the country in their meetings vowed to successfully implement the important tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Reports were made at the meetings to be followed by oath-taking speeches.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said Kim Jong Un set this as a year of a grandiose struggle, a year of sea changes in which all service personnel and people should usher in a heyday of Songun Korea by raising a fierce wind of a fresh leap forward on all fronts of building a thriving socialist nation and clearly indicated the tasks and ways to the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 They underscored the need for those in agricultural field to apply scientific methods in farming, increase the proportion of mechanization in it, produce quality compost and thus contribute to increasing agricultural production of the country in this significant year marking the 50th anniversary of the Theses on Socialist Rural Question published by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They underlined the need for those in industrial field to actively develop finishing building materials by relying on locally available resources and indigenous technology, boldly push ahead with the technological updating of factories and thus successfully supply building materials necessary for construction in Pyongyang.
					
					 They stressed the need for the scientists to make remarkable sci-tech successes to reach the world standards as befitting the scientists living in the great era of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Field Medical Service Campaign Launched in DPRK
articles.content:
Field Medical Service Campaign Launched in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Health workers in the DPRK are now conducting vigorous field medical service in hearty response to the New Year Address given by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 In the capital city of Pyongyang, a team of the Pyongyang Medical College Hospital under Kim Il Sung University launched its medical service at the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex. It has carried on medical checkup and treatment among its employees, encouraging them to make innovations in production of electricity.
					
					 Those of the Kim Man Yu Hospital and the Pyongyang Ophthalmic Hospital are active at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, while a team of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital is giving medical service to women employees at the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill. Such field medical service campaign was launched in local areas, too. 
					
					 Health workers in South Hamgyong Province went to the Komdok Mining Complex, Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, Ryongsong Machine Complex and other major industrial establishments in the province to take care of their employees' health.
					
					 Those of South Phyongan, North Hwanghae and other provinces have encouraged the working masses to boost production while working together with them and conducting sincere field medical service among them.

articles.title: Letter to S. Korean Students
articles.content:
Letter to S. Korean Students
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The students' committee of Kim Chaek University of Technology Saturday sent a letter to the students of Korea University and all other students in south Korea in response to their widespread campaign of displaying wall papers "How are you," the campaign sweeping south Korea at present. 
					 The letter noted that not big wall paper "How are you" displayed at Korea University at the end of last year is not a simple exchange of greetings, adding:
					
					 The wall paper represents the feelings of everyone who is not fine due to the misrule by the conservative forces which have driven the people's living into dire destitution and mercilessly violated democracy after seizing power through all sorts of wrong doings and high-handed practices.
					
					 This also reflects all university students' expression of pent-up grudge against the present situation in south Korea, a land of growing darkness and despair.
					
					 Students who should be engrossed in study full of enthusiasm and hope for their future, having a beautiful dream and idea, have to toil and moil and leave school halfway or commit suicides due to skyrocketing school expenses. This is the situation of south Korea.
					
					 "How are you" is a natural question raised by youth and students who value justice and truth and aspire after the new on behalf of the times and history and it speaks for the mindset of the public angered by the conservative ruling forces keen on reviving the fascist dictatorship and pursuing unpopular policies.
					
					 Seen everywhere in south Korea are wall papers reading "Not fine due to Park Geun Hye", "Not fine due to the moves for reviving the 'yusin' dictatorship" and "Fine only when Park Geun Hye steps down."
					
					 As all south Koreans answered the question of students, one can never be fine in south Korea where justice and truth are ruthlessly trampled down, democracy is violated and the people's living is in dire destitution due to the revival of "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 "How are you" -- This phrase serves as a slogan of the struggle encouraging all south Koreans to turn out in resistance against dictatorship for democracy.
					
					 The just struggle of the students in the south for independence, democracy and reunification will surely bring a new society, new life to south Korea.
					
					 All youth and students in the northern half of Korea including Kim Chaek University of Technology will as ever fully support and encourage the righteous and sacred struggle of the students in the south for democracy against fascism.

articles.title: Exploits Performed by Great Men of Mt. Paektu for Bolstering Militia Forces
articles.content:
Exploits Performed by Great Men of Mt. Paektu for Bolstering Militia Forces
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Service personnel and people of the DPRK are greeting the 55th anniversary of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards. 
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung founded the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, new type of revolutionary armed forces which successfully inherited the tradition of the anti-Japanese guerrillas on January 14, Juche 48 (1959). 
					
					 He put up the militant slogan "Rifle in one hand and hammer or sickle in the other!" and wisely led the members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards to unanimously turn out in the economic construction and in the drive to bolster up the national defence capabilities.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to successfully materialize Kim Il Sung's idea of building the Juche-oriented militia forces. 
					
					 He made public works including "The Worker-Peasant Red Guards Is Powerful Militia Forces of Our Party," inspiring all commanding officers and members to become fighters devotedly defending the leader by fully preparing themselves politically and ideologically and in military technique and those strong in faith and will. 
					
					 A fresh heyday has been opened in the history of the building of the Juche-oriented militia forces as Marshal Kim Jong Un is holding the top post of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK. 
					
					 He made public "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" and other works, clearly indicating an orientation and ways for the Worker-Peasant Red Guards to intensify the combat and political training and bolster up its combat capabilities. 
					
					 Parades of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards held in celebration of the 60th, 63rd and 65th anniversaries of the DPRK fully demonstrated the validity and vitality of the Workers' Party of Korea's military line of self-reliant defence  and the might of the people's defence forces once again before the whole world.

articles.title: Driving Force for Korea's Reunification: News Analysis
articles.content:
Driving Force for Korea's Reunification: News Analysis
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- All Koreans in the north and the south of the country and abroad are of the strong will to open up a new phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year, upon receiving the historic New Year Address of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 As clarified in the address, the driving force for national reunification is all the members of the Korean nation in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 It is none other than the entire Korean nation that earnestly wants the national reunification with vital interests in it.
					
					 The Korean nation is a homogeneous nation of the same blood that has lived on the same land for 5 000-odd years. But the outside forces forced division upon the Korean nation, disregarding its sovereignty.
					
					 Untold are pains the Koreans have suffered from nearly 70-year-long national division. Their families and relatives remain separated into the north and the south and the continuous national division makes it impossible to achieve the unified development of the nation.
					
					 Korea is like an organism that cannot survive separately. Its reunification is a nationwide cause directly related to the destinies of all Koreans, and it is the only way for the nation's existence and prosperity.
					
					 It is also because the entire Korean nation has the power to achieve the reunification. 
					
					 The motive power of reunification depends on wisdom, will and might of the nation.
					
					 The Korean nation is exceptionally strong in patriotism and mental strength. It has preserved its identity as a homogeneous nation for a long time, bravely defeating the persistent aggression and interference of outside forces.
					
					 It is also well aware of the tragedy of the divided country and is able to solve the reunification issue in conformity with its actual conditions.
					
					 To bring earlier the national reunification or not depends on how the Koreans will struggle for it. No outside forces can have greater interests in Korea's reunification than the Korean nation and solve the reunification issue on behalf of it.
					
					 Only when all Koreans, responsible for national reunification, remain steadfast in the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself, can they reunify the country independently to meet the interests and demands of the nation.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Condemns Japan's Scheme for Arms Buildup
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Condemns Japan's Scheme for Arms Buildup
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Japan is making a fuss about "missile attack from north Korea".
					 Its government allotted 250 million U.S. dollars from the 2014 defense budget to the purchase and development of latest interceptor missiles and the increase of their capabilities allegedly to cope with such "attack."
					
					 It also plans to purchase F-35A stealth fighters, P-1 sea patrol planes and patrol helicopters in addition.
					
					 The assertion about "missile attack" is a crafty and sinister attempt to justify Japan's arms buildup and reinvasion scheme.
					
					 Since its defeat in the Second World War, Japan has never abandoned its scheme for reinvasion, gradually increasing military spending.
					
					 In the 21st century, it has drastically raised the military expenditure, making full preparations to stage overseas aggression any moment. It decided to invest 46 billion U.S. dollars for this year's military spending, 2.8 percent higher than last year. What should not be overlooked is that most of this fund is used for the development and production of advanced missiles essential to preemptive attacks on other countries.
					
					 After all, Japan's assertion about "attack", a pretext for its overseas aggression, is intended to hit its aims of holding the command of sea and air around the Korean Peninsula in case of emergency.
					
					 This cunning sophism is also aimed to soften the world public's vigilance toward Japan, which is getting further militarized and lurching to the Right, and realize its ambition for reinvasion at any cost.
					
					 The present Japanese government is a rare extreme-rightist one in the history of Japan since its defeat in World War II. In a little more than one year after its emergence, the government enacted various kinds of laws to lay a legal ground for armaments expansion.
					
					 Late last year it adopted documents for bolstering up the navy and air force of the "Self-Defense Forces" in order to militarily contain its neighboring countries and regions. Meanwhile, the chief executive and other ruling forces of Japan have stepped up the moves to turn the country ultra-rightist through visits to the Yasukuni Shrine.
					
					 Japan's arms buildup and reinvasion scheme are now bringing dark clouds of war to Northeast Asia. Such moves can never be allowed.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defending National Security and Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defending National Security and Peace
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- In order to give a strong impetus to the victorious forward movement of the national reunification in the present grave situation, it is important to make positive efforts to defend national security and peace, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 For defending the homeland in which the Korean nation should live for all ages and reunifying the country and achieving national prosperity, it is necessary to remove the danger of a war from the Korean peninsula as soon as possible and achieve a durable peace, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities aligning with it are escalating confrontation with the DPRK and resorting to war moves against it. Their heinous moves are the main factor of hurting the national security and destroying peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. has remained unchanged in its hostile policy towards the DPRK and it is becoming more reckless with each passing day.
					
					 The extremely tense situation is ascribable to the south Korean warmongers' military confrontation racket against compatriots as a shock brigade for carrying out foreign forces' strategy for aggression.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should abandon their reckless attempt at aggression against the DPRK and stop arms buildup and joint military drills escalating tension and creating the danger of war.
					
					 Anybody who is concerned about the destiny of the nation and wishes for peace and reunification should resolutely turn out in the actions to denounce, check and frustrate the moves of the war-thirsty forces at home and abroad who are harassing the country's peace and bringing dark clouds of a nuclear war to the nation.
					
					 All compatriots in the north, in the south and abroad should make a fresh advance in the national reunification movement this year at any cost by turning out in the nationwide struggle to defend national security and peace.

articles.title: Independence, Peace and Friendship Are Avowed Idea of Foreign Policy of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Independence, Peace and Friendship Are Avowed Idea of Foreign Policy of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Independence, peace and friendship are an avowed idea of the foreign policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The foreign policy of the DPRK reflects the common desire of the Koreans and the world progressives and the requirement of the present international situation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Independence is the principled stand of the party and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will strengthen solidarity with world anti-imperialist and independent forces including socialist and non-aligned countries on the principle of independence, and develop good-neighborliness with all countries which respect the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The people of the DPRK are pushing forward the building of a thriving socialist country by holding rifle on one hand and hammer or sickle on the other hand despite the imperialists' continued aggression and war moves. Peace is most valuable to the Koreans under this situation. It is entirely thanks to the peace-loving efforts made by the DPRK that a war has not broken out on the peninsula under such tense situation.
					
					 Friendship and solidarity are closely related. Only when solidarity is achieved in the idea of friendship, can it be solidarity in the true sense of words and display its great might.
					
					 The DPRK, setting it as an important policy of its foreign activities to develop friendship with world people, is making every possible effort for its realization.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will carry out the idea of independence, peace and friendship and work hard to foil the imperialists' aggression and war moves and realize the cause of global independence.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Large-scale Joint Landing Drill
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Large-scale Joint Landing Drill
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers plan to stage a large-scale joint landing drill against the DPRK late in March.
					Huge armed forces including at least 5,000 U.S. marines belonging to the U.S. forces in Japan and over 3,000 south Korean marines, more than 10,000 in all, large transport planes, large landing craft, fast landing craft, armored cars and helicopters will be involved in the drill, part of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					 It was reported that the joint landing drill will be the largest in its scale and subject since Team Spirit joint military exercises in 1989.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers are getting more frantic with war maneuvers against the DPRK from the outset of the year, a blatant challenge to the desire of fellow countrymen to improve the inter-Korean relations and usher in a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity and a belligerent move to ignite a war against the DPRK on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.

articles.title: Internet Paper of Koreans in U.S. Accuses S. Korean Regime of Suppressing Opposition Party
articles.content:
Internet Paper of Koreans in U.S. Accuses S. Korean Regime of Suppressing Opposition Party
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The internet paper of Koreans in the U.S. Minjok Thongsin in an article Wednesday denounced the south Korean puppet regime for deliberately fabricating a case to crack down on an opposition party.
					 It recalled that 400 odd spots of the recorded lecture which had been raised as evidence in a trial of the attempted rebellion case of the United Progressive Party (UPP) proved to be deliberately twisted.
					
					 The reason why the Intelligence Service and the prosecution are kicking such a row over the case, exaggerating and falsifying it, is that if the UPP is allowed to function any longer, it will bring to daylight the truth about the election rigging. it noted, adding:
					
					 The south Korean regime is making desperate efforts to stamp out the progressive political party by labeling it a "party following the north" in a bid to justify the fraudulent election.
					
					 One cannot overlook the outrageous act of Park Geun Hye brazen-facedly behaving as "president" without any apology for her illegal acts and that of the "Saenuri Party" suppressing the UPP and people by invoking the "Security Law".

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Further Strengthen the Socialist System of Our Country" and leader Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" were posted by the Switzerland-Korea Committee on its website on Dec. 25 last year.
					 Kim Il Sung's work, made public on December 25, Juche 61 (1972), clarifies the struggle of the DPRK government for the socialist revolution and construction, the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK and the main contents of the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK and the tasks to steadily develop the socialist system.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's work, published on December 25, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that respecting the forerunners of the revolution is the requirement of the revolution and indicates the principal issues arising in establishing the moral traits of respecting them and encouraging the people to cherish noble moral obligation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Introduced by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Introduced by Bulgarian Organization
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association carried the gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address in its bulletin on Jan. 5.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Bulgarian, Bangladeshi Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Bulgarian, Bangladeshi Figures
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, and Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, made public statements on Jan. 3 and 4 in support of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The honorary chairman said Kim Jong Un's New Year Address is a precious document that promises a hopeful future to the global progressive people aspiring after socialism.
					
					 He sent a militant greeting to the Korean people all out for march of 2014 under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, adding that Kim Jong Un set forth grandiose goals and tasks for the new year.
					
					 The president expressed full support to the tasks advanced by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 He expressed confidence that the army and people of the DPRK would bring about a decisive turn in the sacred struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve national reunification under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Favored by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Favored by Foreign Personages
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Personages of Indonesia and Myanmar released statements on January 2 supporting supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 Shapril Arsiyad, chairman of the Indonesian Federation of Transport Workers Unions, said:
					
					 We fully support HE Kim Jong Un's New Year Address and demand the south Korean authorities stop reckless racket of confrontation with fellow countrymen and moves to provoke a new war at once and take practical measures for reconciliation and unity.
					
					 We express firm solidarity with the DPRK government in its efforts to sincerely implement the Three Principles of National Reunification, the June 15 North-South Joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to usher in an era of peace and prosperity.
					
					 We sincerely wish the Korean people greater successes and progress in their drive for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification.
					
					 Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, noted that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as important guidelines and militant banner for the Korean people's struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification.
					
					 He expressed confidence that the party and people of the DPRK would surely build a thriving nation and accomplish the cause of national reunification as desired by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Beninese Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Beninese Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Benin released a statement on January 1 supporting supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The statement said:
					
					 All members of the Socialist Party of Benin received Comrade Kim Jong Un's New Year Address with great excitement.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un called for making a fresh advance in the national reunification movement this year true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His New Year Address is an immortal great programme clearly indicating the way of achieving Korea's reunification as it calls for rejecting foreign forces, holding fast to the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself, positively struggling for defending the security of the nation and peace and establishing a favorable climate for improved relations between the north and the south.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin unequivocally supports the proposal for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 We extend invariable solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for achieving the reunification of the country under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un, lodestar of reunification and tender-hearted father of the nation.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed by Foreign Websites
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed by Foreign Websites
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Russian and Brazilian Internet homepages carried special write-ups on Dec. 18 and 30 last year on the occasions of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il and the 2nd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					 Articles titled "Snow and Kim Jong Il", "Leader who loves future" and "Highly civilized socialist country" illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un were posted on Russian website Mega Mir.
					
					 The articles dealt with the immortal revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people and Kim Jong Un's noble love for the younger generation and future.
					
					 They also introduced the indefatigable struggle of the army and people of the DPRK for building an economic power and a highly civilized socialist country.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its internet homepage a special write-up interwoven with photos on the feats performed by Kim Jong Un in leading the army.
					
					 The committee in an article titled "Feats performed by Marshal Kim Jong Un for the country and its people" said that the last two years were a period of victory and honor in which the might of the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army was fully demonstrated as the army and people of the DPRK waged struggle upholding Kim Jong Un as supreme commander of the revolutionary armed forces. 
					
					 An article titled "Rare art of leadership" praised the exploits Kim Jong Un performed by providing guidance to monumental structures including Munsu Water Park and Masikryong Ski Resort.
					
					 The DPRK will successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving country in the near future as it is led by Kim Jong Un possessed of rare art of leadership, it noted.

articles.title: British Organizations Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Moves
articles.content:
British Organizations Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Moves
						
Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on January 5 denouncing the south Korean authorities for escalating confrontation with the DPRK.
					 Seeing the recent moves of the south Korean puppet fascist clique one can know well who sincerely hopes for peace on the Korean Peninsula and who seeks a war, the statement said.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address underscored the need to establish a favorable climate for improved relations between the north and the south, calling upon all the Korean people in the north, in the south and abroad to achieve solid unity under the truly patriotic banner, the principle of By Our Nation Itself, turn out in the nationwide struggle for the reunification of the country and thus open up a new phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year, the statement noted.
					
					 This reflects the unshakable will of the DPRK government and the desire of the whole Korean nation to achieve peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula, it said, and went on:
					
					 Progressive mankind extends full support and solidarity to the proposal for Korea's reunification set forth in his New Year Address.
					
					 But the south Korean puppet authorities are making such reckless remarks as throwing a wet blanket over improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 This reveals the intention of the south Korean authorities to opt for confrontation and war this year, too, having no willingness to improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 We resolutely condemn the south Korean puppet authorities for wrecking the peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The peace on the peninsula will be achieved only when the south Korean puppet clique is overthrown.

articles.title: Presidente de Congo se reune con embajador coreano
articles.content:
Presidente de Congo se reune con embajador coreano
						
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Republica de Congo, Denis Sassou-Nguesso, recibio el dia 6 al embajador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acreditado en su pais, Ri Myong Chol.
					El mandatario dijo que conoce bien la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y expreso la conviccion de que se desarrollaran continuamente las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Mitines en granjas, fabricas y empresas en apoyo al mensaje de Ano Nuevo de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Mitines en granjas, fabricas y empresas en apoyo al mensaje de Ano Nuevo de Kim Jong Un
						
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en distintas localidades del pais los mitines de granjeros y empleados de las granjas, fabricas y empresas para materializar cabalmente las tareas programaticas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					En los actos hubo informes e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que al definir el presente como un ano de la lucha impetuosa y de grandes cambios en que se abrira la era de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun al lograr nuevos saltos en todos los dominios de la construccion de un Estado socialista poderoso y prospero, el Mariscal aclaro las tareas y remedios que se presentan ante el ejercito y pueblo coreanos.
					
					Continuaron que en este significativo ano, en que se acoge el cincuentenario de publicacion de la tesis sobre el problema rural socialista por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, introduciran de modo activo los cientificos metodos de cultivo, aumentaran el porcentaje de los trabajos mecanizados y prepararan los estiercoles con la meta de contribuir a la produccion suficiente de cereales.
					
					Refirieron que desarrollaran con recursos y tecnologias domesticos los nuevos materiales de acabado e impulsaran la modernizacion tecnica de las fabricas de la rama interesada para producir y suministrar suficientes materiales necesarios a la construccion suntuosa de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					Enfatizaron que siendo cientificos de la gran epoca de Kim Jong Un, alcanzaran muchos exitos cientifico-tecnicos con la audaz determinacion de superar el nivel mundial.

articles.title: ACNC censura actitud astuta y grosera de Japon
articles.content:
ACNC censura actitud astuta y grosera de Japon
						
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- Japon actua con imprudencia hablando de "ataque de misil" de alguien. 
					Asigno 250 millones de US$ del presupuesto de defensa nacional de 2014 para comprar, desarrollar y elevar la capacidad de los misiles interceptores de ultima moda bajo el rotulo de hacer frente al "ataque de misiles del Norte de Corea". 
					
					Intenta comprar adicionalmente los aviones F-35A, P-1 y helicopteros de patrulla naval. 
					
					El rumor de "ataque de misil" que difunde el pais isla es una artimana para ocultar su ambicion de nueva agresion y el aumento armamentista. 
					
					Desde su derrota en la segunda guerra mundial hasta la fecha Japon vino aumentando sistematicamente los gastos militares con la invariable ambicion de nueva guerra. 
					
					En el nuevo siglo dispuso de todos los preparativos para emprender en cualquier momento la agresion a ultramar. 
					
					Y este ano aumento los gastos militares 2.8 por ciento mas que el ano pasado, o sea, asigno 46 mil millones de US$. 
					
					Lo mas problematico es que la mayoria de esos fondos se invierten para el desarrollo y produccion de misiles ultramodernos imprescindibles para el ataque preventivo contra otras naciones. 
					
					Pues, el rumor de "ataque" de alguien de que habla Japon es un pretexto para realizar la ambicion de agresion a ultramar y conquistar el dominio del mar y del aire en el contorno de la Peninsula Coreana en el tiempo de emergencia. 
					
					Y es una sofisteria para desviar la atencion y precaucion de la sociedad internacional sobre las autoridades japonesas derechizadas y militarizadas extremadamente y lograr por todos los medios su ambicion de nueva guerra. 
					
					El actual gobierno japones es el mas derechista no visto despues de su derrota. 
					
					Durante un ano y pico despues de su mandato fabrico las leyes de toda indole que permiten aumentar los gastos militares. 
					
					A finales del ano pasado, aprobo los documentos que reflejan la ambicion de fortalecer las fuerzas navales de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" y prevalecer en lo militar sobre los paises y regiones perifericos. 
					
					El mandatario y otras fuerzas gobernantes aceleran la ultraderechizacion de la sociedad japonesas mediante la visita al santuario Yasukuni y otros. 
					
					Debido al aumento armamentista y la ambicion de nueva agresion de Japon, se cierne el nubarron de guerra en el Nordeste Asiatico.
